page.title: 05SOCIAL ACTIVITIES
page.content:
There are many social activities, some of them of a{sporting}nature, supported by the local villagers and the farming community. There is the {Loppington Shooting Sydicate,}which meets each week during the season, from 1st September to 1st February. They shoot pheasant, partridge, and wild duck. A local farm breeds pheasants and partridges for the shoot. The{North Shropshire Hunt visits Loppington two or three times a year for fox hunting and some local people take part. Loppington also has a{Football Club}which actively competes in the local league matches during the football season.
cont. page 6
